name: Wild Frontiers is a Facebook connected and mobile game
blurb: Wild Frontiers is a social city building game set on the edge of the frontier during the U.S. Westward expansion.

rewards.reward: You get a big "Thank You!" and personal recognition on our site along with instant access to our Private Beta Test. You, as a contributor, will have access to the development builds, you may then decide to add additional focus to the development with critique, ideas, likes and dislikes as well as reporting potential bugs and crashes. Additionally, as part of this process, you will receive support, fixes and suggestions on how to get things working. Plus, we'll send you exclusive updates on the art of the game. Sweet!

We're gearing up for the forthcoming launch of Wild Frontiers and would like to extend you an invitation to participate in the beta test. Be a part of the project and help craft the game with your feedback! You'll also have access to an exclusive set of Wild Frontiers digital wall papers (in full HD) along with a FREE copy of the game once it ships. What could be better?

Everything above and a completely custom commissioned piece of art signed by the team! On top of this your name will be added to a special "thank you" section of the credits in the final game. Not too shabby ;-)

All of the above PLUS the original music of "Wild Frontiers" by Dirty Filthy Mugs as heard in the Kickstarter trailer (in a download pack ready for your computer, mobile device or for burning to disc). But wait, there's more! Anyone pledging $50 or more will also receive a totally fashionable Wild Frontiers shirt.

Everything above AND an exclusive print of artwork from the game! Plus, you'll receive a page from our Wild Frontiers notebook which contains miscellaneous notes, sketches, etc - related to the making of Wild Frontiers and signed by the author (sure to be a collector's item one day). This is your chance to own a piece of Wild Frontiers history!

All of the above (wow!) as well as a special piece of concept art (in hard-copy), signed by the development team. You will be also credited as a Premium Supporter in the "Special Thanks" section of the game and website. But we're not done yet! As a token of thanks for your generosity you will also get YOUR Wild Frontiers style portrait in the game and end up as one of the characters in the final version of the game. Time to take on the frontier, as only YOU can!

The Designer Deluxe Spectacular! All of the above as well as custom made concept art of your choosing, signed by the development team, the upcoming all-original soundtrack in downloadable form, and a special thank you video from the team. What about all this designer business you ask? Well, thanks to your amazing pledge we will be more than glad to give YOU the chance to work with US in designing a future level, character, or item! Work with the development team, and let your creativity shine!
